name: The Walking Dead: Empires
storyline: In Georgia, USA, a group of humans has survived a purge that has led to the arrival of a virus that has devastated the majority of humanity: said virus makes the deceased revive with the sole obsession of eating everything that moves, including humans. It is also spread by bites from the undead. Join the characters from the series The Walking Dead in this cooperative survival game: survive the hordes by raising your base level, fight against the dead... And against the living who will try to plunder you and take over the lands
summary:
Cooperative survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world after a letas virus causes people to turn into zombies when they die and infects the people they bite. Game from the series franchise: The Walking Dead.
The game is web3 and can be found in the Gala Games store. Developed by Ember Entertainment
